title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set
OB: The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be shown when creating a new table group, regardless of whether the dataset is set or not. As part of the template requirements, the UI should not perform any validation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset.
3. Try creating a new table group. The group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set.
